items.name: SRD_SuperMessageEditor
items.rawContent:
{
    "parentId": "AFAD6CEFK59C1A4298SBABFE7AEC1B964622",
    "displayName": "$$SRD_SuperMessageEditor.C00E80871FCE4843596BB49525161921E609",
    "windowTitle": "$$SRD_SuperMessageEditor.C00E80871FCE4843596BB49525161921E609",
    "type": "event_command",
    "id": "gs.ShowMessageEditor",
    "group": "$$8C18C980KCA7CA4FCDS99EFEC6824693DD97",
    "subGroup": "$$8C18C980KCA7CA4FCDS99EFEC6824693DD97",
    "windowSize": {
        "w": 671
    },
    "expanded": false,
    "defaultValue": { "waitForCompletion": 1, "duration": 15, "expressionId": null, "custom": { "object": { "x": 0, "y": 0, "size": { "width": 300, "height": 100 }}}, "message": "", "position": 0, "characterId": 0, "partial": 0 },
    "inlineImage": { "formula": "return GSIsNull(p.expressionId) ? GS.VN.resourceForCharacter(p.characterId) : GS.VN.resourceForExpression(p.expressionId);", "folder": "Graphics/Characters" },
    "fullSizeItems": [
        {
            "valueFormula": "return lcsg(p.message) || '[No Message Entered]';",
            "type": "GSQTextArea",
            "attribute": "message",
            "defaultValue": "",
            "valueTranslator": { "write": "return GS.VN.writeMessageData(v, p)" },
            "localizable": { "data": { "cid": "characterId" } }
        }
    ],
    "quickItems": [
        {
            "type": "GSQPopupField",
            "attribute": "editor",
            "identifier": "editor",
            "dataSource": ["$$SRD_SuperMessageEditor.722DA0F97044554842688FA5AEE952034A4C"],
            "valueTranslator": { "read": "return 1" },
            "valueFormula": "if(p.editor === 0) { SRD.SuperMessageEditor.openTextEditorWindow(p); p.editor = 1; };  return lcs('SRD_SuperMessageEditor.146A07670026414D2039DB70C0891181AECC');"
        },
        {
            "label": "$$1CCE5315K1F61A4059SBC64E0B6CECA383C3",
            "valueFormula": "return fmtRecord('characters', p.characterId || 0);",
            "attribute": "characterId",
            "type": "GSQDataRecordField",
            "updateLocalizationData": true,
            "dataSource": "characters",
            "variableButton": { "dataSource": "strings" }
        },
        GSQ.CONTROLS.VOICE_SELECTION,
        {
            "label": "$$8EC8F86A73D0524F417974A56C2120B44D7F",
            "valueFormula": "return !GSIsNull(p.expressionId) ? fmtRecord('characterExpressions', p.expressionId) : lcs('FB0EA56B5F9B9146719B5F66A690FC3B9928');",
            "type": "GSQDataRecordField",
            "dataSource":"characterExpressions",
            "attribute": "expressionId",
            "allowEmptySelection": true
        },
        Object.override(GSQ.CONTROLS.DURATION, { "lockable": true, "label": "" }),
        GSQ.CONTROLS.WAIT_FOR_COMPLETION
    ],
    "sections": [
      
    ]
}
